application.name: Gydl
application.summary: Downloads content from YouTube or other video platforms

description.p: Gydl (Graphical Youtube-dl) is a tool that allows downloading of content from YouTube.com and a few other sites. It provides a dialog like interface for quick and easy video or audio downloads without disturbances.
Gydl is based upon the popular youtube-dl program. A big thank you to the developer(s)
